Package meico.pitches

Class FeatureElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.pitches.FeatureElement
  • public class FeatureElement
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one element of a pitch feature vector, i.e. an energy value on a frequency or chroma band and note id associations to it.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private double energy  
      private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> noteIds  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FeatureElement()
      constructor
      FeatureElement​(double energy)
      constructor that sets an energy value but no note associations
      FeatureElement​(double energy, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> noteIds)
      constructor to set both, energy and note associations
      FeatureElement​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> noteIds)
      constructor that leaves energy at 0.0 but sets note associations
